amendment.description: To provide for a review of the legal status of the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4213 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4213 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6120) To provide for a review of the legal status of the Junior Reserve Officers' Training Corps program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4213 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4213 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
